question: You are a code expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate and professional responses. Be sure to provide executable code wherever possible. Create a club website using Alibaba Cloud Server, along with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The club name is "Aviation and Remote Sensing Research Society" (Hangyao Research Society), with the domain name hangyaoyuanhang.cn, which is already registered. Please write out the complete aaPanel (BaoTa Panel) setup and all necessary frontend files.

checklist.title: Is the aaPanel (BaoTa Panel) setup process fully documented?
checklist.description: Examine whether the code provides complete step-by-step instructions for setting up aaPanel on Alibaba Cloud Server, including server initialization, security group configurations, aaPanel installation commands, port configurations, and initial security settings. Score 0 if basic installation steps are missing, 5 if installation is covered but lacks security considerations, and 10 if the setup includes secure configurations, SSL setup, and proper user permission settings.

checklist.title: Is the domain configuration correctly implemented?
checklist.description: Check whether the solution correctly configures the domain hangyaoyuanhang.cn within aaPanel, including DNS settings, A record configuration, proper website creation in aaPanel, and SSL certificate implementation. Deduct 3 points if DNS configuration guidance is incomplete, 3 points if SSL implementation is missing, and 4 points if there's no explanation for subdomain management or redirection setup. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the club website's information architecture fully developed?
checklist.description: Evaluate if the website contains all essential sections for an Aviation and Remote Sensing Research Society, including Home, About Us, Research Areas, Team Members, Publications/Projects, Events, Resources, and Contact pages. Deduct 2 points for each missing critical section. Check whether the navigation system allows intuitive movement between these sections. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the frontend implementation complete and cohesive?
checklist.description: Review whether all necessary HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files are provided and properly organized. Assess if the code includes responsive design with mobile breakpoints, proper asset organization, and file structure. Deduct 5 points if the responsive design is inadequate, 3 points if the code structure lacks organization (e.g., no separation of concerns), and 2 points if the implementation is incomplete. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the code robust?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code can handle common abnormal situations (such as broken image links, form submission errors, browser incompatibilities, etc.) and provide friendly error prompts or recovery mechanisms. Code with strong robustness should be able to effectively handle these edge cases, giving 10 points. If the robustness is average, give 5 points, and if no exceptions are handled, give 0 points.

checklist.title: Are there any innovative features that are eye-catching?
checklist.description: Check whether the code includes surprise features that enhance the experience (e.g., 1. Interactive aerospace visualization 2. Real-time satellite tracking map 3. Member-only content portal with authentication). Add 3 points for each practical innovative feature implemented (maximum 10 points).

checklist.title: Are there any redundant features?
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: 1. Redundant implementation of similar functions (e.g., multiple carousel plugins doing the same thing) 2. Function modules unrelated to an aviation research society (e.g., game features, unrelated calculators) 3. Fancy effects that affect performance (e.g., excessive animations, auto-playing videos). Deduct 3 points for each redundancy found, and directly deduct 10 points if the core functions are interfered with by redundant code.

checklist.title: Does the code have engineering quality?
checklist.description: Review modular design (such as separating components/layouts/utilities), code maintainability, and asset optimization practices. Deduct 5 points if global CSS/JS pollution is found or design patterns are not used; deduct 5 points if the code duplication rate is too high (over 30%); deduct 5 points if there's no optimization for image loading and performance. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the interface vision meet professional design standards?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the overall design follows modern design principles: 1) Harmonious color matching (no more than 3 primary colors, preferably aviation-themed blues or technical grays) 2) Proper layout spacing (element spacing follows the 8px multiple principle) 3) Professional font system (body font size ≥ 14px, line height over 1.5 times). Deduct 3 points for each crowded visual element, 5 points for a glaring color combination, and 5 points for chaotic text-image layout. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the dynamic interaction smooth and seamless?
checklist.description: Judge whether the dynamic effects conform to human perception characteristics: 1) Click feedback delay ≤ 100ms 2) Transition animation duration controlled between 300-500ms 3) Clear visual focus guidance. Deduct 5 points for each operation without feedback, 3 points for visual after-images during fast sliding, and 5 points for hard-to-find key function buttons. The full score is 10 points.
